Instruction: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Lightly coat an 8-inch pie plate with grease.
In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar together until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the vanilla extract.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30 to 35 minutes, until the center is set. Allow to cool for at least 20 minutes before serving.
Bake on the lower rack of the preheated oven until the center is slightly firm, about 35 minutes. Let the cake cool for 1 hour in the pie plate. Serve warm or refrigerate overnight and serve chilled.
